name: Goopy's Kitchen +Plus
description:
Welcome to Goopy's Kitchen! +Plus

Your Job is to clean this place of all the germs and dirt!!! 

Goopy(Player) Notes:

You must pickup bubble bullets and water cannon, then pick up notes to start.

  • Your Shots are tied to your HP. You can kill yourself!
  • WASD to move and Left click to shoot. 
  • E to pick up.
  • Cycle Through Bubbles and Water Cannon (1-3). Noted by the symbol on the right of the HP bar.
  • Left Click to shoot your bubbles
  • Hold Left Click to fire the Water Cannon.
  • Water Cannon can only be used while you're BIG Goopy!
  • Sinks will heal you.
  • Shooting Bubbles hurts Goopy.
  • Cleaning Tiles also hurts Goopy.
  • Doors Require Keys and Clean Floors.
  • The smaller the Goopy, the faster the Goopy!
GERM Notes:
  • Orange Germs leave behind a trail but wander aimlessly around. Don't run into them or they will bite!
  • The Purple Virus chases you and is much quicker! It also bites!
  • Dirty Tiles empower the GERMS and VIRUS!
  • UNKNOWN!!!!!
Credits:

Art By GnollYourRoll

Sounds:

  • Main Song - Kevin Macleod
  • Bubble Sound
  • Bubble Sound #2

Updated from the MiniJam84 Submission. 

Bug Fixes:
  • Fix Mob spawner in rooms. Previously the player could set them off by walking back over the area, causing things to get BUCK WILD!
  • Updated Water Cannon Icon(UI)
  • Win Screen and Win Condition works.
